pageAlert.title: Notice
pageAlert.text: Remember to always tie up your dinosaur when you leave the house.

pageAlert.title: Submission successful
pageAlert.text: Thanks for sending us information on your favourite dinosaur.

pageAlert.title: Warning
pageAlert.text: Dinosaurs are on the loose in Canberra!

pageAlert.title: Error
pageAlert.text: You cannot register your dinosaur as it is too big.
